definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: The development of second and the third industry is slow.
sentences.chinese: 首先是贫困地区非农产业的发展的约束。

sentences.english: Guyuan region, a well known poor region, is in the south of Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region of China.
sentences.chinese: 固原地区地处宁夏南部，是全国著名的贫困地区。

sentences.english: The poorest neighborhoods did have lower rates of diagnosis.
sentences.chinese: 贫困地区的诊断率确实相对较低。

sentences.english: We should unswervingly uphold the poverty alleviation policy to lead all rural works in the poverty-stricken areas.
sentences.chinese: 坚持以扶贫攻坚总揽贫困地区农村工作全局。

sentences.english: The Chinese government has paid great attention to assisting poor areas to develop education.
sentences.chinese: 中国政府十分注意扶持贫困地区发展教育事业。

sentences.english: The stone are uesd as desk in some poor areas.
sentences.chinese: 在一些贫困地区，石头被用来当做学习的课桌。

sentences.english: Make a one-off donation to help needy children in Hong Kong and rural China.
sentences.chinese: 一次过捐款，帮助中港及中国贫困地区有需要的儿童。

sentences.english: Violent crimes are especially rambunctious in under-developed areas.
sentences.chinese: 在贫困地区，暴力犯罪尤其猖獗。

sentences.english: Door-to-door water-sellers are still a common sight in poor areas.
sentences.chinese: 在贫困地区，人们常常可以看到挨家挨户卖水的人。

sentences.english: Loess hilly gully country of the western Jin is one of the poverty region of China.
sentences.chinese: 晋西黄土丘陵沟壑区是我国贫困地区之一。

sentences.english: In one chapter he returns to the impoverished region of South Wollo.
sentences.chinese: 在书中的一章节讲到他回到了挝娄南部的贫困地区。

sentences.english: The bishop planned to necessitous areas of the city.
sentences.chinese: 主教打算走访城市里的贫困地区。

sentences.english: Thev alwaYs supplied food and clothing for the children in the poor districts regularly.
sentences.chinese: 他们一直定期向贫困地区的儿童提供食品和衣服。

sentences.english: Many children in the poor area had calcium deficiency.
sentences.chinese: 许多贫困地区的儿童得了钙缺乏症。

sentences.english: Objective To learn about AIDS-related knowledge and attitude to AIDS prevention in in teachers in poor areas.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解贫困地区教师对预防艾滋病相关知识态度。

definition: to lift oneself out of poverty
"left-behind children", rural children whose parents have to make a living as migrant workers in distant urban areas, but cannot afford to keep the family with them
to rise from poverty and become prosperous (idiom)/poverty alleviation
program bringing education to underdeveloped areas/to work in such a program
